cards.name: D-01155
cards.title: Batch loading is failing on call to library of congress' website.
cards.body:
Attempting to retrieve an xml file from the LC website, but being denied permission.

Moved a copy of the file to:

http://php.library.tamu.edu/marc.xml

And now hitting that url for the file.

cards.name: B-03370
cards.title: Add advanced search link.

cards.name: B-03467
cards.title: Update new feedback and purchase forms to incorporate all fields from the existing feedback form
cards.body:
Needs to have the new styling and needs to pass WAVE ADA check.

 

All the key/value information will go right into the Notes field.

 

We will be finishing out and fully styling the feedback form, the request a purchase form, and ideally the https://coral.library.tamu.edu/resourcelink.php?resource=1440 link resolver while we're at it.

cards.name: B-03387
cards.title: Importing data from claimed request
cards.body:
Doug,

Sarah encountered a new instruction stats error.  She imported her data over from her claimed requests.  When she goes to edit the record from view records, the data will not retain the course name/number.  It just keeps disappearing. 

 

We also have the issue of the session characteristics and teaching methods continuing to not show when someone pulls data from the claimed requests.

 

GWILA -

cards.name: B-03388
cards.title: Test Functionality with JAWS - Aria tags in HTML
cards.body: I think this issue may be related to a lack of Aria tags in the HTML for the Instructional Stats Manager. There is no JAWS emulator for Chrome, so the only way to test it is to try it on a machine with JAWS.

cards.name: B-03389

cards.body:
We only want two tabs one that shows all records that I am associated with and then ALL records.

The tab names woudl be My Records and All Records

cards.body: transition to "sent to helpdesk" state

cards.title: "Login to Vote" button shows on Service view even if there are no Feature Proposals available
cards.body: If no features active for that service then no button should show

cards.name: B-03565
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like "In Progress" Feature proposals hidden and non-votable.
cards.body: In Progress will never be on public display and only visible to Service Managers.

cards.name: B-03617
cards.title: As a Stakeholder, I would like to optionally associate my email address with my Ideas so that I can receive emails later
cards.body:
A checkbox, selected by default, indicating that the stakeholder wants to receive emails.

Prepopulate an email field with netid.  This can be edited.  Grey out the email field if unchecked.

cards.name: B-03621
cards.title: As a Stakeholder, I would like the Service pre-populated when I link to the Idea submission form from a given context
cards.body: Use either a query or path in the URL that the Item creation form can use to pre-populate the

cards.name: B-03622

cards.body: We think this has been done, but it needs documentation.

cards.name: B-03623
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like to send Ideas to Sugar
cards.body: In case they would have been better rendered as issues.  This changes the status to "Sent to Sugar"

cards.name: B-03624
cards.title: As a Developer, I would an enumerated Status associated with each idea
cards.body:
Required for business logic of several other cards.

Waiting on Review

Elevated

Sent to Helpdesk

Rejected

cards.name: B-03625
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like to reject Ideas
cards.body: Must enter text for rejection.  Persist on the idea.  Email owner of Idea if opted-in.  Change status to Rejected.

cards.name: B-03626
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like to filter the list of Feature Proposals by state

cards.name: B-03627
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like to select the state of a Feature Proposal on creation (default "In Progress")

cards.name: B-03629
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like to flag Feature Proposals as private
cards.body: Default would not be private.

cards.name: B-03630
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like "private" Feature proposals to be shown only to logged-in users
cards.body:
On the service view is the only place this will be implicated for now.

 

Here is some old requirements gather text motivating this feature:

...so that I can think about ones for which voting has been closed or hide ones that I am still working on.  Also, patrons should not be annoyed by ones that can't or shouldn't be acting on.

 

"For Features we need the ability to make it active or something to remove it from public display.  

[For example] voting is closed on Test 2 so I want to suppress it from public view while I think about it.

cards.name: B-03631
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like to sort the list of Feature Proposals by public/private

cards.name: B-03632
cards.title: As a Developer, I would like an enumerated State associated with each Feature Proposal
cards.body:
In Progress:  still being drafted, hidden from others, no voting

Active: Open for voting by those logged in, displayed to all users

Submitted: Sent off to project management API.

On Hold:  Closed for voting, but not sent to project management API.  "There may be hope".

Rejected: Closed for voting, terminal state.

cards.name: B-03633
cards.title: As a Product Owner, I would like to reject a Feature Proposal
cards.body: Require text.

cards.name: B-03634
cards.title: As an Admin, I would like to delete Ideas
cards.body: Have a confirmation button.  Disallow for elevated Ideas.
